ad_text: Jack Cooper Sponsored Jack Cooper Transport is hosting a CDL Driver Hiring Event! We can't wait to meet you!!! Comfort Suites Conference Room 5775 Coventry Lane Fort Wayne, IN 46804 There will be plenty of truck parking available, along with snacks, coffee, water, and prizes. $6,000 - $15,000 SIGN-ON BONUSES BEING OFFERED!!!! WE WILL TRAIN YOU TO HAUL CARS BENEFITS: • Pay up to $1.43/loaded mile, plus loading/unloading compensation • Free medical, dental, and vision insurance covers the employee and family • Teamster Pension • Life Insurance • Sick Pay • Paid Vacation • Paid Holidays • Corporate Lodging cards provided for hotel stays while out on the road. This is a regional opportunity which will allow you more home time than any OTR job, while you make the same or better level of income. We offer a fantastic benefits package, FULLY PAID BENEFITS for you and your family and Teamsters Pension!! Stop by and visit with us to learn more about Jack Cooper. We may even have current drivers at event to answer your questions! Have questions that need answering before the event? Call us for more information at 800-569-5201. Jack Cooper Sponsored We're seeking motivated individuals to add to our team in Wayne, MI for training in car haul. Qualify for sign-on bonus up to 15k depending on experience! Requirements: -Must possess a current and valid Class A CDL -Must have at least 6 months of semi-tractor-trailer driving experience -Will to work Saturdays as work week is Monday through Saturday -Qualified candidates must be able to operate manual semi transmission -No more than a combination of 3 moving violations/at-fault accidents in the last 3 year period The Wayne terminal delivers in the following states: MI, OH, IL, KY and IN. Average weekly miles typically falls around 1500 but can vary. Work week is Monday through Saturday. Training is offered and typically ranges between 3-5 weeks, just depending on how quickly you should learn. Training is conducted partially in Wayne and other training facilities in surrounding states. Gas reimbursement and hotels are provided when training outside of Wayne. What are we offering you? -Home time every 2-3 days -Sundays off -Paid training/orientation -Compensation of $1-$1.43 per mile -Additional loading pay -A free union benefits package that covers dental, medical and vision for both driver and family -Pension plan -Paid vacation-1 week after 1 year, 2 weeks after 3 years, 3 weeks after 5 years, 4 weeks after 10 years & 6 weeks after 25 years -Paid holidays -Dispatch beginning at 6am -Corporate Lodging for hotel stays while away from home -Signing bonus of 6k for 6-11 months of driving experience, 10K for minimum of 1 year driving experience and 15k for experienced car haulers Classes starting every week! For consideration, please submit your application by visiting www.jackcoopernews.com JACKCOOPERNEWS.COM Home | Jack Cooper Employee Site The Jack Cooper Employee Site provides information and resources for its employees.
